profileDescription: I am a Front-end Developer specializing in ReactJS with over 3 years of experience. I have 2 years of experience developing e-commerce systems and outsourcing projects, along with more than 1 year of experience in Blockchain & DeFi. I always focus on user experience, performance, and product quality throughout the development process.
projectCexDesc: A centralized exchange (CEX) project providing Spot, Futures, deposit/withdraw, KYC, and related features.
collaborationDesc: Collaborate and communicate with Backend, BA, and Tester teams.
integrateWebsocket: Integrate WebSocket for real-time trading data
buildAdminDashboard: Build an Admin Dashboard for system management
buildUiUx: Build UI, handle responsive layouts, and implement animations for the entire system
spotTradingDesc: Build Spot trading interface including order book, price chart, and order form (Buy/Sell). Integrate WebSocket to update price, volume, and order status in real time; handle input validation, order states, and synchronize data with REST APIs.
futuresTradingDesc: Develop Futures trading interface with concepts such as leverage, positions, margin, and PnL. Handle real-time data flow, position states, order opening/closing, and display risk metrics in real time.
depositWithdrawDesc: Build UI flows for asset deposits and withdrawals, display transaction history and processing status. Integrate APIs, validate data, and handle loading, error, and security-related states.
adminDashboardDesc: Build an administration system with overview dashboards, data tables, filters, pagination, and CRUD functionalities to manage users, transactions, assets, and system configurations.
buildUiSystem: Build UI, handle responsive layouts, and implement animations for the entire system
buildAdminCms: Build Admin CMS (package, wallet, asset, and role permission management)
designRealtimeDashboard: Design real-time dashboard UI for Futures & Spot bots
integrateExchangeApi: Integrate Binance / Bitget APIs via user API keys
implementTradingSignals: Implement trading signal system and order status tracking
buildDepositWithdraw2fa: Build asset deposit/withdraw flows with 2FA security
dashboardAnalyticsDesc: User, Financial, and Withdrawal KPIs; growth charts, top investors, and pending requests.
userTransactionDesc: Manage users, verify/block accounts, deposit–withdraw–package purchase history, balance adjustments, API keys, AUM, PnL, debt, and commissions.
packageVoucherCommissionDesc: Manage packages, vouchers, and multi-level commission systems (F1–F3) for package-based and profit-sharing models.
groupTradingSignalsDesc: Manage Spot/Futures groups, trading signals, order history, PnL, and real-time performance.
walletSystemDesc: Wallet system, assets/chains, trading pairs, financial flows, and audit logs.
adminPermissionDesc: Manage access control and CRUD permissions based on roles (role-based access control).
xaiFinanceDesc: A profit-generating investment platform where users invest in funds and earn returns.
developInvestmentFund: Develop investment fund features and profit tracking
buildLandingUi: Build introduction page UI with animations and responsive design
investmentFundDesc: Develop investment fund interface to track invested amount, profits, transaction history, and distribution status.
dailyClaimRewardDesc: Build daily check-in reward feature by package, display rewards, claim status, and total earnings, integrated with reCAPTCHA v3 to prevent bot claims.
tokenSwapDesc: Develop swap flow from USDT to internal token, display exchange rates, received amount, and transaction history.
seedSaleVestingDesc: Build Seed Sale interface, track distribution progress, and claim rewards based on vesting schedules.
adminDashboardDesc2: Build admin system including dashboard, user management, transactions, system configuration, and admin permissions.
walletManagementDesc: Build wallet address change feature, validate wallet ownership, and synchronize updates with the system.
university: Ho Chi Minh City University of Industry and Trade - HUIT – Information Security (System Security)
innovationStartup: Innovation & Entrepreneurship: Online Certification Support App
autoTradingBotProject: Automated trading bot project allowing users to connect Binance / Bitget APIs and execute trades automatically.
